oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 16th Bluegrass and Country Festival and Memorial Days at Rebel Park (18544)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grandpa Jones, 1913-1998; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Houston, David, 1935-1993; Davis, Jimmie, 1899-2000; Wise, Chubby; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977; Music festivals; Bluegrass music; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing the 16th Bluegrass and Country Festival and Memorial Days featuring Grandpa Jones and Ramona, Charlie Louvin and the Big Men, David Houston, Jimmie and Anna Davis, Chubby Wise, Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper, Areno Boys, Sullivan Family, Amazing Grace, and more at Rebel Park on May 13, 14, and 15. Poster features metal photoplates of Grandpa Jones, Charlie Louvin, and David Houston. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/45328/
